  • Setting Up Jekyll and Github Pages

    tech December 16, 2012

    Fun with jekyll and and github pages. Just getting set up and trying to figure out all the bells and whistles this baby has on her. Hell, I'll probably re-edit the contents of this post a dozen times as I dial in the basic styles.
